title: Drawing, "Vanity and Mirror", October 17, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: V. & S. 10/17/33; inscribed in graphite and erased at upper margin, center: Mahogany & White Maple; lower right in graphite: SCALE1"=1'0"/7673 [circled]/& Mirror, [check mark}; dimensions, instructions, materials in graphite throughout.
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of vanity and mirror. Square mirror wtih partial border on right and bottom sides; three round balls/lights? in upper left corner of mirror. Rectangular vanity below mirror with darker wood (?) on surface of piece, and lighter wood (?) in body of piece. Long drawer at right of vanity, two smaller stacked drawers at left. Drawers at left have round pulls, and drawer at right has rectangular pull.
